name: Talk with your Dog – Dog Translator
name_original: Talk with your Dog – Dog Translator
description:
THIS IS A GAME APP. YOU CAN NOT TALK WITH YOUR DOG LIKE YOU DO WITH YOUR FAMILIY AND FRIENDS. FUNNY APP TO MAKE JOKES AND EXERCISE YOUR AUDITORY MEMORY.

Tired of sure your dog does not understand what you ask? When you talk with him, staring at you wondering what're saying? Do you throw the ball and looks at you how he did not know what to do because no one explained? In instead to go for the newspaper stands still staring into space? During the meal you do not have talking points?

The communication problems with your dog are over with Talk With Your Dog. You will no longer return to blackmail him with rich cookies or explain things with sign language that as little understands and so much rage it gives your dog. And all thanks to three wonderful utilities of the app:

• ABC of dogs
• Human–Dog Translator
• Barked Words game

With the Talk With Your Dog app you will learn their ABC, phonetics rich full of shades. The translator enables you to construct sentences and then reproduce them barking up, a good way to become familiar with the language and super useful in day to day with your dog.

When you have a good command of barked, test your knowledge with the game of barked words. Twenty-one lessons in which you will have to understand the barking of dogs to form the respective sentences in your language. Drag the letters in the correct position.

Test your memory and retention capacity. If you learn to bark…, you will learn any language!

By completing all the lessons and get the diploma to hang on the wall of your room (like the dentist), your life and your dog will be more enjoyable. You can comment on football game and TV series, explain jokes, accuse each other when you play Parcheesi, laugh at Cesar Millan methods in the "Dog Whisperer", and much more fun!

No matter the breed of your dog, be it a Boxer, Rottweiler, Bulldog, German Shepherd, Golden Retriever, Yorkshire, any kind of Terrier, Jack Russell, Greyhound, American Staffordshire, Pit Bull, Beagle, Chihuahua, Poodle, Chow Chow, Collie, Dalmatian, Bulldog, Doberman, Great Dane, Husky, Bloodhound, Setter, or without race. Talk to your dog!

Download the Talk With Your Dog app for your favorite device fully free and learn how to bark with your best friend.
